tasks.task: Drive a tractor equipped with a fertilizer spreader to apply fertilizer to a field.
subtasks: Sit in the driver's seat of a tractor.
Engage the tractor's engine.
Shift gears to operate the tractor efficiently.
Navigate the tractor through the field, staying in the correct path.
Adjust the spreader to the appropriate width for the field.
Monitor the distribution of fertilizer from the spreader.
Stop the tractor at the end of the field and reverse direction if necessary.

tasks.task: Operate a combine harvester to harvest crops.
subtasks: Climb onto the combine harvester.
Start the combine's engine.
Adjust the combine's cutting height to match the crop height.
Monitor the harvesting progress and perform routine checks.
Guide the combine through the field, ensuring thorough coverage.
Use the auger to load harvested crops into a bin or trailer.
Manage the combine's grade and angle when approaching a bin or trailer.

tasks.task: Apply pesticide to crops using aerial spraying.
subtasks: Board the agricultural aircraft or helicopter.
Secure the pesticide spray system to the aircraft.
Pilote the aircraft over the crops, maintaining a consistent altitude and speed.
Monitor the spraying pattern to ensure coverage.
Adjust the spray pressure or nozzle if needed.
Land the aircraft at the end of the operation and de-secure the spray system.

tasks.task: Conduct a soil test to assess nutrient levels.
subtasks: Walk through the field to collect soil samples at designated points.
Use a soil auger or sampling tool to obtain representative samples.
Package the soil samples in labeled bags.
Transport the samples to a laboratory for analysis.
Review the test results to determine fertilizer needs.

tasks.task: Plant seeds into the soil using a planter.
subtasks: Attach the planter to the tractor.
Adjust the planter's depth and spacing settings.
Drive the tractor through the field, operating the planters.
Monitor the planting progress, ensuring proper seed placement.
Adjust the planter as needed during planting.
Disassemble the planter and prepare it for storage after completion.
